title: [USA / Burden of Damascus] Security officials foil terror attack against the POPE amid fears JV team could attack him
content:
Security officials foil terror attack against the POPE amid Islamic State fears
By Tom Parfitt
Tue, Sep 15, 2015
American authorities have already stopped one "threat" ahead of the Pope's visit to the US later this month, according to congressman Michael McCaul. ... More on the foiled JV team threat at Express
